channel.title: What's this "unable to startup listener" thing with just 1 server started?
channel.description:
Hey, I know that usually when it says "Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use" means that there are 2 servers started... but this is when I only have 1 server started and I don't have any other things started... but to clear things out, it's not my server's files problems, but it's something on the computer.... because I have tried running a new clean source and it still does it... :/ Any one know? It must be another program that's using the port, but how do I find out what program?
And how do I remove or change that one program so it doesn't use that port?
It looks like this: [code]===================================== =====::::|FURYSCAPE ENABLED|::::===== ===================================== ClientHandler: Accepted from 209.40.195.38:43242 ClientHandler: Accepted from 89.149.214.213:53237 ClientHandler: Accepted from 89.149.214.213:53420 ClientHandler: Accepted from 89.149.214.213:42000 ClientHandler: Accepted from 209.40.195.38:49761 ClientHandler: Accepted from 89.149.214.213:42260 Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already i n use? [/code]
I start the server... then it just says working for a while then it'll just pop up... and when it does that, no one can get on anymore, but the people that are already on, can stay on, it's weird... and the server status list won't detect it anymore either, so my server keeps going offline... Which is bad....

item.title: What's this "unable to startup listener" thing with just 1 server started?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Well I know I can use other ports but I won’t ever since I’m using the default port and most people are lazy and won’t bother going on my server since there’s a different port… So do you know any programs to check ports? And I do have a virus scanner, how do I find out if it’s using my port?

Read full topic
item.source: What's this "unable to startup listener" thing with just 1 server started?

item.title: What's this "unable to startup listener" thing with just 1 server started?
item.dc:creator: @waynewilson1 waynewilson1
item.description:
@waynewilson1 wrote:

if you wish to check the ports, to find out whats using what, there are programs out there for it, also…it could be something such as an auto update tool for a virus scanner, or another program, watch what you do… just out of curiosity, have you tried other ports? if you try another port, it should work…

Read full topic
item.source: What's this "unable to startup listener" thing with just 1 server started?

item.title: What's this "unable to startup listener" thing with just 1 server started?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Hey, I know that usually when it says “Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use” means that there are 2 servers started… but this is when I only have 1 server started and I don’t have any other things started… but to clear things out, it’s not my server’s files problems, but it’s something on the computer… because I have tried running a new clean source and it still does it… Any one know? It must be another program that’s using the port, but how do I find out what program?

And how do I remove or change that one program so it doesn’t use that port?

It looks like this:

[code]=====================================
=====::::|FURYSCAPE ENABLED|::::=====

ClientHandler: Accepted from 209.40.195.38:43242
ClientHandler: Accepted from 89.149.214.213:53237
ClientHandler: Accepted from 89.149.214.213:53420
ClientHandler: Accepted from 89.149.214.213:42000
ClientHandler: Accepted from 209.40.195.38:49761
ClientHandler: Accepted from 89.149.214.213:42260
Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already i
n use?
[/code]

I start the server… then it just says working for a while then it’ll just pop up… and when it does that, no one can get on anymore, but the people that are already on, can stay on, it’s weird… and the server status list won’t detect it anymore either, so my server keeps going offline… Which is bad…
